name: Anduin Wrynn, High King Priest
keywords: Inspiration — The first heal each turn costs (1) less.
text: Lesser Heal — Restore 2 HP to a character.
prompt: A young human king-priest in ornate white and gold robes raises a radiant staff, golden light pouring over wounded soldiers in Stormwind’s cathedral district.

name: Sylvanas Windrunner, Banshee Queen
keywords: Arrows of the Banshee — Your secrets cost (1) less.
text: Black Arrow — Deal 2 damage to any target.
prompt: An undead ranger-queen with glowing red eyes draws a shadowy bow in the ruins of Lordaeron, purple banshee energy trailing her arrow.

name: Garrosh Hellscream, Warmonger
keywords: Berserker — After you gain Armor, your hero has +1 ATK this turn.
prompt: A brutal orc warlord with Gorehowl raised high, red war banners whipping in a dusty Durotar gale as embers rain from a distant siege.

name: Illidan Stormrage, The Betrayer
keywords: Fel Rush — Your hero can attack this turn.
text: Fel Glaives — Deal 1 damage to all enemies.
prompt: A night elf demon hunter with blindfold and fel-green tattoos slashes twin warglaives, waves of green energy ripping through demon ranks.

name: Arthas Menethil, Deathlord
keywords: At end of your turn, gain 1 Armor.
text: Frostmourne’s Bite — Deal 1 damage and Freeze the target.
prompt: A death knight in black-and-ice plate grips a runeblade wreathed in frost, blue soul fire spilling across a frozen battlefield.

name: Arcane Barrage
prompt: Ribbons of blue arcane missiles streak from a mage’s hands, detonating among a cluster of charging gnolls in Elwynn.

name: Renew
prompt: Golden prayer sigils wrap a wounded knight, torn tabard mending under warm cathedral light.

name: Windfury Totem
prompt: A carved shamanic totem crackles with whirling gusts, banners snapping as dust devils spiral outward.

name: Freezing Trap

effects.text: Secret — When an enemy attacks, return it to its owner’s hand; it costs (2) more.

text: Secret — When an enemy attacks, return it to its owner’s hand; it costs (2) more.
prompt: Frosty glyphs bloom across a forest floor as a leaping beast is hurled back in a surge of ice.

name: Snake Trap

effects.text: Secret — When one of your allies is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes with Rush.

text: Secret — When one of your allies is attacked, summon three 1/1 Snakes with Rush.
prompt: A sprung hunter’s trap erupts into a writhing mass of serpents in a jungle clearing.

name: Counter Shot

effects.text: Secret — When your opponent casts a spell, counter it.

text: Secret — When your opponent casts a spell, counter it.
prompt: An arrow of pure silence shatters a mage’s spell mid-cast, ripples of null energy scattering runes.

name: Retaliation Runes

effects.text: Secret — When a friendly character takes damage, deal 2 damage to the source.

text: Secret — When a friendly character takes damage, deal 2 damage to the source.
prompt: Blue runes flare across the ground; a striking foe recoils as the blow rebounds with icy force.

name: Vengeful Spirit

effects.text: Secret — After a friendly ally dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.

text: Secret — After a friendly ally dies, deal 3 damage to a random enemy.
prompt: A tormented banshee streaks from a fallen ranger, shrieking toward an enemy line.

name: Heroic Leap
text: Deal 1 damage to all enemies. Gain 2 Armor.
prompt: A warrior crashes down from a mighty leap, shockwaves rippling through a crowd of kobolds.

name: Blade Flurry
prompt: A rogue becomes a blur of steel, arcs of slash-marks trailing through a bandit camp.

name: Bloodlust
text: Give your hero and allies +3 ATK this turn.
prompt: Orcish drums thunder as red rage magic surges across a warband charging into battle.

name: Mark of the Wild
prompt: Emerald vines and antlered spirit energy wrap a warrior beneath towering night elven trees.

name: Savage Strike
prompt: A feral druid lunges with clawed hands, a single target engulfed by a crescent slash.

name: Ancestral Knowledge
prompt: A shaman communes with stone-carved spirits, glowing glyphs pouring into a scroll.

name: Ice Lance
text: Deal 1 damage and Freeze the target.
prompt: A razor of blue ice pierces a charging gnoll, frost racing across its fur.

name: Flamestrike
prompt: Columns of fire roar across a battlefield, molten cobblestones and ash swirling in a gale.

name: Holy Smite
prompt: A spear of golden light lances down from a stained-glass sky, blasting a ghoul.

name: Nature’s Grasp
text: Transform a random friendly ally into a 3/3 Treant until end of turn.
prompt: Vines whip around a druid’s companion, reshaping into a bark-skinned treant mid-roar.

name: Rallying Cry
text: Give your hero and allies +1 Health.
prompt: A commander raises a banner; a surge of courage steels the line.

name: Warglaive Training
prompt: Fel-green etched blades hum as a demon hunter grips twin warglaives.

name: Mind Vision
prompt: A priest peers into an enemy’s mind, reflections of their secrets rippling across an orb.

name: Ferocious Bite
prompt: A spectral bear jaw snaps shut around a target, glowing fangs crunching magic wards.

name: Sunder Armor
prompt: A warrior’s hammer shatters a shield crest, metal shards spraying.

name: Call of the Wild
text: Summon two 4/4 Great Wolves with Rush.
prompt: Two massive spectral wolves bound from a green portal, snow spraying.

name: Thorns

effects.text: Give a character ‘Damage Reflect (1) this turn.’

text: Give a character ‘Damage Reflect (1) this turn.’
prompt: Barbed vines coil around a guardian, spikes poised to lash at attackers.

name: Windfury Harpy
prompt: A shrieking harpy rides a raging gale over Thousand Needles, twin talons outstretched.

name: Stormheim Vrykul Berserker
text: Enrage — Whenever this survives damage, gain +2 ATK.
prompt: A towering vrykul howls, frost winds whipping his braids as arrows splinter on his shield.

name: Sunfury Archer
prompt: A blood elf archer looses a radiant arrow from a gilded balcony in Silvermoon.

name: Warsong Outrider
prompt: An orc outrider spurs a wolf mount across the Barrens, red war banners snapping in the wind.

name: Draenei Vindicator
text: Battlecry — Restore 2 HP to a character.
prompt: A crystal-wreathed draenei paladin raises a glowing hammer, holy light spilling outward.

name: Nightblade Assassin
prompt: A shadowy night elf with crescent blades perches in moonlit branches.

name: Grizzly Protector
prompt: A massive brown bear rears, interposing itself between hunters and their charge.

name: Felstalker Hound
prompt: A lean felhound prowls, green runes pulsing along its spines.

name: Tirisfal Shadow Priest
prompt: An undead priest in dark vestments channels void bolts in a ruined crypt.

name: Reef Crawler
prompt: A chitinous crustacean scuttles along a tidepool, spines bristling.

name: Nagrand Talonwind
prompt: A great bird of prey dives and wheels over the green plains of Nagrand.

name: Thalassian Ranger
prompt: A crimson-clad archer strings a luminous arrow along the Sunfury Spire.

name: Stonetalon Sentry
prompt: A sentinel braces a wooden shield among sharp pine ridges and rope bridges.

name: Argent Medic
text: Battlecry — Restore 2 HP to a character.
prompt: A tabarded medic binds wounds under a fluttering Argent Crusade banner.

name: Thunder Bluff Brave
prompt: A tauren shieldbearer stands resolute atop the mesas of Thunder Bluff.

name: Scourge Thorncaller
prompt: Barbed bone spikes jut from a skeletal knight’s armor, dripping necrotic sap.

name: Darkspear Witch Doctor
text: Battlecry — Summon two 1/1 Loa Spirits with Rush.
prompt: A troll witch doctor rattles bone charms as spectral loa spirits bound from a mask-lined hut.

name: Stormwind Captain
text: End of your turn: Give a random ally +1 ATK.
prompt: A stern captain rallies footmen along Stormwind’s battlements.

name: Gadgetzan Sapper
text: Battlecry — Deal 2 damage to the enemy hero or a minion without Taunt.
prompt: A grinning goblin hefts a bundle of dynamite in a back-alley bazaar.

name: Obsidian Destroyer
prompt: A hulking obsidian golem cracks with inner magma light.

name: Riverpaw Marauder
prompt: A snarling gnoll brandishes a jagged cleaver along a riverside camp.

name: Twilight Drake
prompt: A dark-scaled dragon coils in a crystalline cavern lit by violet flame.

name: Bloodhoof Protector
prompt: A tauren in totemic armor braces under a rain of arrows.

name: Redridge Hunter
text: Battlecry — Summon a 1/1 Hound with Rush.
prompt: A ranger whistles as a lean hound darts from the brush in Redridge.

name: Cenarion Warder
text: End of your turn: Restore 2 HP to a random friendly character.
prompt: A druid tends a moonwell as silver ripples radiate healing.

name: Frostwolf Grunt
prompt: A fur-clad orc braces a shield amid a snowy pass.

name: Gilnean Sprinter
prompt: A worgen dashes on all fours through rain-slick cobbles under gas lamps.

name: Bloodsail Buccaneer
prompt: A laughing pirate swings from rigging over a cannon-blasted deck.

name: Kul Tiran Deckhand
prompt: A burly sailor in blue coat barrels down a gangplank with a boarding axe.

name: Ashenvale Protector
prompt: A massive guardian beast stands firm beneath Ashenvale boughs, bark-like fur bristling.
